markdownRemark.html:
Even though there is [some prior art to this][1], I wanted to document my own findings in the process somewhere. The next commands assume a powershell cli.

mkdir ts-func-demo; cd ts-func-demo
npm install func
npx func init
 



[1]: https://medium.com/@amr.farid140/awesome-typescript-azure-functions-part-1-project-setup-1f5950e7a704

frontmatter.title: Typescript type shenanigans 2: specify at least one property
